head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAUFIELD, MARY A. (NEE LARSEN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAUFIELD, MARY A. (NEE LARSEN)

block.p: CAUFIELD--Mary A. (nee Larsen), of Douglaston, NY, on April 7, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Joseph F. Caufield. Beloved mother of Marita van der Have, Kathryn Caufield-Broz, Mary Alice Duchene, Barbara Caufield, Carolyn Caufield, Jeanne Marie Caufield, Joseph F. Caufield Jr., and Jacqueline Caufield. Beloved sister of William Peter Larsen Jr. and Carol Luby (nee Larsen). Also survived by 12 grandchildren and two great-grandchildren. Visiting in Doyle B. Schaffer Funeral Home, corner of Northern Blvd. and Little Neck Pkwy., Little Neck, NY on Tuesday 25 and 7-9 pm. Mass of Christian Burial, Wednesday at 9:45 am in St. Anastasia Roman Catholic Church, Douglaston, NY. Interment in Mt. St. Marys Cemetery, Flushing, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the American Lung Association, 61 Broadway, 6th Floor, NY, NY 10006.
